name: Text in bullet points is the same size as text above and below it

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P4 - Low-Impact (Edge or unsuitable to repeat?)
customFields.Update notes:
Steve Mudie — Tuesday, September 22, 2020 3:07 PM
• Removed from manual testing

inline.description:
Text in bullet points is the same size as text above and below it
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. In a test channel, post as described in Test Data field
inline.testData:
This is a normal sentence.
<newline>(just make a new line - don't type this in)
1. this is point 1
 - this is a bullet under 1 with a space before the dash at the beginning
<newline>(just make a new line - don't type this in)
this is more normal text
inline.expectedResult: • All text in the post should be the same size. Text in the bullet point should not be larger than the text above or below it.
